venue.name: The New England Gallery of Latin American Art

item.description:
The New England Gallery of Latin American Art is hosting a fund raising event to benefit the




OBAMA VICTORY FUND



---

With special guest Roger Fisk, Obama For America,
MA State Director, at the New England Gallery of Latin American Art.

Live Music by Tito & Leticia
An amazing talented duo with a Latin flare.

Hors d' oeuvres & Beverages will be served

RSVP at info@obamalatino.com


Suggested contribution $50.00-$150.00

Please make check payable to:
The Obama Victory Fund
or contribute on line by following this link:
http://www.obamalatin...
item.how_to_find_us: You'll recognize me! But I'll wear a name tag just in case.

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The New England Gallery of Latin American Art hosts an Obama Fundraiser
